name: Single Bridge
description:
Single Bridge is a fast- paced endless runner game that will put the player’s reflexes to the ultimate test. Tap to rotate and cross the bridges as the main character approaches them. It's not as easy as it looks!

FEATURES:
- Addictive one-touch gameplay.
- Many built-in unlock-able characters.
- Daily reward system.
- In-app purchasing.
- Leaderboards
